Package org.github.fussel178.telestion.extension.corfu.corfu.mapper

Class CorfuPayloadMapper

java.lang.Object
org.github.fussel178.telestion.extension.corfu.corfu.mapper.CorfuPayloadMapper
public class CorfuPayloadMapper extends Object
This class implements a Corfu payload transformer that can map AppTelemetryPayload and AppTelecommandPayload from their binary format into a JsonMessage format and back.

  • Method Details

    • getPayloadFields

      public PayloadField[] getPayloadFields​(Class<? extends CorfuStruct> type)
      Returns all fields of a CorfuPayload wrapped in PayloadField for better handling.
      Parameters:
      type - the class type of the CorfuPayload
      Returns:
      fields of the CorfuPayload

    • getConstructor

      public <T extends CorfuStruct> Constructor<T> getConstructor​(Class<T> type) throws NoSuchMethodException
      Returns the constructor for a CorfuPayload that accepts parameters to fill all record fields. (aka the invisible predefined constructor of a Record)
      Parameters:
      type - the class type of the CorfuPayload
      Returns:
      the constructor that can create new objects of type CorfuPayload
      Throws:
      NoSuchMethodException - gets thrown if no constructor can be found that accepts all payload fields as parameters

    • size

      public int size​(Class<? extends CorfuPayload> type)
      Returns the size of the CorfuPayload.
      Parameters:
      type - the class type of the CorfuPayload
      Returns:
      the sum of all payload fields inside the CorfuPayload

    • serialize

      public void serialize​(PrimitiveOutputStream stream, AppTelecommandPayload payload) throws CorfuSerializationException
      Serializes a CorfuPayload to its binary format.
      Parameters:
      stream - the stream that accepts the encoded binary data
      payload - the payload object that contains values for all payload fields
      Throws:
      CorfuSerializationException - if errors happen during serialization

    • deserialize

      public CorfuPayload deserialize​(PrimitiveInputStream stream, short appId, short payloadId, short nodeId) throws CorfuDeserializationException
      Deserializes a CorfuPayload from its binary format to an actual Java object.
      Parameters:
      stream - the stream that provides the encoded binary format
      appId - the id of the telemetry app extracted from the corfu message header as unsigned byte
      payloadId - the id of the payload extracted from the corfu message header as unsigned byte
      nodeId - the id of the sending node extracted from the corfu message header as unsigned byte
      Returns:
      an instantiated Java object that holds the decoded values
      Throws:
      CorfuDeserializationException - if errors happen during deserialization

    • deserialize

      public CorfuStruct deserialize​(PrimitiveInputStream stream, Class<? extends CorfuStruct> payloadType) throws CorfuDeserializationException
      Deserializes a CorfuPayload from its binary format to an actual Java object.
      Parameters:
      stream - the stream that provides the encoded binary format
      payloadType - the class type of the CorfuPayload
      Returns:
      an instantiated Java object that holds the decoded values
      Throws:
      CorfuDeserializationException - if errors happen during deserialization
